thread.title: 13 museums named recipients of art conservation grants
thread.title_full: 13 museums named recipients of art conservation grants

title: 13 museums named recipients of art conservation grants
text: > South Carolina 13 museums named recipients of art conservation grants This undated photo provided by the Bank of America Art Conservation Project shows a colossal ancient marble, wood and iron Chinese Buddha in London's British Museum. The 19-foot-tall Buddha Amitabha (Buddha of the Western Paradise) will be restored with a grant by the Bank of America. Thirteen museums in seven countries have been named recipients of the grants, totaling more than $1 million, for the conservation of artworks. (Bank of America Art Conservation Project, courtesy of The Trustees of the British Museum, via AP)
